headline: Leidos Supports Security Scanner Donation to Enhance Costa Rica's Port Security
summary: The U.S. government recently delivered two fixed scanner portals to the Costa Rican government to help bolster the nation's port security.Leidos' VACIS IP6500 is a key technology in the fixed portal...
